mapper.insert: insert into taobao_order (ID, ORDER_NO, TID, ALIPAY_NO, SELLER_ID, INVOICE_NAME, PAY_TIME, PAYMENT, NUM, DISCOUNT_FEE, TOTAL_FEE, POST_FEE, STATUS, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_MESSAGE, BUYER_NICK, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, RECEIVER_CITY, RECEIVER_DISTRICT, RECEIVER_MOBILE, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, RECEIVER_STATE, RECEIVER_ZIP, CONSIGN_TIME, CREATED, MODIFIED, SYNC_STATUS, SYNC_BATCH_NO, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SYNC_REMARK, SELLER_NAME, END_TIME, COD, TYPE, LOGISTICS_COMPANY_NAME, LOGISTICS_COMPANY_CODE, OUT_SID, ADJUST_FEE, SHIPPING_TYPE, IS_BRAND_SALE, IS_PRESELL, PRESELL_STATUS, FRONT_MONEY, FINAL_PAYMENT, FRONT_MONEY_PAY_TIME, FINAL_PAYMENT_PAY_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{syncStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{syncRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shippingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBrandSale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isPresell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presellStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{finalPayment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{frontMoneyPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finalPaymentPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select ID, ORDER_NO, TID, ALIPAY_NO, SELLER_ID, INVOICE_NAME, PAY_TIME, PAYMENT, NUM, DISCOUNT_FEE, TOTAL_FEE, POST_FEE, STATUS, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_MESSAGE, BUYER_NICK, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, RECEIVER_CITY, RECEIVER_DISTRICT, RECEIVER_MOBILE, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, RECEIVER_STATE, RECEIVER_ZIP, CONSIGN_TIME, CREATED, MODIFIED, SYNC_STATUS, SYNC_BATCH_NO, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SYNC_REMARK, SELLER_NAME, END_TIME, COD, TYPE, LOGISTICS_COMPANY_NAME, LOGISTICS_COMPANY_CODE, OUT_SID, ADJUST_FEE, SHIPPING_TYPE, IS_BRAND_SALE, IS_PRESELL, PRESELL_STATUS, FRONT_MONEY, FINAL_PAYMENT, FRONT_MONEY_PAY_TIME, FINAL_PAYMENT_PAY_TIME from taobao_order order by id
